patthana15.38:1.1: Sārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.38:2.1: Sārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.38:3.1: Anārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
